__e: I am the world's leading doctor, and I declare the science you are doing is too shocking by half.
He's already killed once, and I don't think he's gonna give a damn about your science.
It's what pays for your science.
I get to hide behind the science of it and just stay in my lab, but Eddie, he's out there every day in the darkness.
I decided against the science and it seems time finally caught up with me.
Well, sometimes you gotta throw out the science and... go for what you know.
You see, science has its own time,... and, very often, any new advance can be a matter of serendipity.
It's like you're saying that science killed God.
I do believe there is more within each of us than science has yet explained.
There are simply some things that science is just too young to understand.
Or is it possible that God and science could be one and the same for you as well?
The science is rigorous, but I think you can handle it.
He would say there was nothing broken that science couldn't fix.
